cards.mainText: There is a merchant offering you food for a price

decisionLeft.pickedText: You bought some food from the merchant

decisionRight.pickedText: You decided you do not need food right now

cards.mainText: As you walk through an alleyway a novice thief holding a knife pops up from behind a crate, threatening you. He demands your money

decisionLeft.choiceText: Give him what he asks for
decisionLeft.pickedText: You gave the thief some money and rushed away as soon as you could

decisionRight.pickedText: You tried to fight back but failed to do so, getting cut by the knife in the process. Luckily for you the thief ran away after hurting you

decision.choiceText: Give him what he asks for
decision.pickedText: You reluctantly gave the thief your coins, wanting to punch him in the process
You fought back, almost killing him in the process. While he stumbled away you took the coins he left behind

cards.mainText: On the streets you see an old lady trying to carry several bags of apples

decisionLeft.pickedText: You helped the old lady carrying the apples home. As a thanks she gave you a bag to keep

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignored the struggles of the old lady and strode onwards

cards.mainText: Walking along the street you come upon an inn. As you enter the inn you the burly man working the counter notices you. "Need a place to sleep? A room for the night costs 5 coins"

decisionLeft.choiceText: Rent a room for the night
decisionLeft.pickedText: You bought yourself a room and got some rest

decisionRight.pickedText: You felt like you did not need a rest just yet and left the inn as quickly as you entered.

cards.mainText: A shady figure approaches you."I have what you seek, a quest to lead you to your destiny! But only if you are willing to pay"

decisionLeft.pickedText: You gave him some money and in return he gave you a red crystal

decisionRight.pickedText: "A mistake! Without guidance you will wander until you die!"

cards.mainText: Three Children are playing games with each other. As they notice you one of them runs towards you. "Hey! Do a trick!"

decisionLeft.pickedText: They give you some apples to juggle with and you try your best. They walked away unimpressed.

decisionRight.pickedText: You walk away, disappointing them

decision.pickedText: On its own you body started to twist and turn into something far from human, losing consciousness in the process. You regained your consciousness looking human, yet different than before

cards.mainText: You see a water fountain

decisionLeft.pickedText: You drank from the fountain and felt your stomach hurting shortly after

decisionRight.pickedText: You threw a coin in the fountain for good luck

cards.mainText: In front of you lies a bag with a name tag

decisionLeft.choiceText: Take the contents of the bag for yourself
decisionLeft.pickedText: You opened the bag and found food, water, bandages and some money

decisionRight.choiceText: Take the bag with you for the owner
decisionRight.pickedText: You took the bag with you in hopes of finding the rightful owner

cards.mainText: You walk past a man down on his luck, claiming he lost all his stuff

decisionLeft.choiceText: Give him the bag you have found
decisionLeft.pickedText: "You found my stuff? I cannot thank you enough! Here, take some of it for yourself"

decisionRight.pickedText: You walk past the man who is probably the owner of the bag you found earlier. Thinking that you may never find the owner you decided to take the contents for yourself

cards.mainText: You see a house with a familiar name

decisionLeft.pickedText: A familiar face opens the door. The man whose bag you found invites you out of gratitude in to stay the night. You feel well rested

decisionRight.pickedText: As soon as you walk past the house a familiar face slams open the door. The man whose bag you found invites you out of gratitude in to stay the night. You feel well rested

cards.mainText: You see a tree with apples on it

decisionLeft.choiceText: Pick up the apples from the ground
decisionLeft.pickedText: You took the apples from the ground, you feel a slight pain in your stomach

decisionRight.pickedText: You kicked the tree and took the fresh apples from the ground

cards.mainText: While walking along the street a medical clinic catches your eye

decisionLeft.pickedText: You went inside the clinic and got a checkup. You feel better

decisionRight.pickedText: You did not go inside the clinic

cards.mainText: In the middle of the market you see a man looking for people willing to do day labor

decisionLeft.pickedText: You did some manual labor to earn yourself some money

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignored your opportunity for some quick cash

cards.mainText: A devote believer in red robes approaches you, wanting to talk about their deity

decisionLeft.pickedText: "Greetings, fellow human! Are you interested in becoming a true believer?" He gives you a pamphlet from the Mutan Order

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignore what they have to say

cards.mainText: A devote believer in green robes approaches you, wanting to talk about their deity

decisionLeft.pickedText: "Greetings! Feeling down on your luck? Become part of the Fortuna Order and feel as lucky as never before!" He gives you a pamphlet from the Fortuna Order

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignore what they have to say

cards.mainText: On your left you see a church of the Mutan Order

decisionLeft.pickedText: You joined the Mutan Order. You feel a weird presence coming from inside of you

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignored your chance to join the Mutan Order and discarded their pamphlet.

cards.mainText: An agonizing pain overwhelms your entire body, feeling like your body turns inside out. You collapse on the ground

decisionLeft.pickedText: When you wake up you find yourself looking different and being stronger than before. You feel like you aren't quite yourself anymore

decisionRight.pickedText: When you wake up you find yourself looking different and being stronger than before. You feel like you aren't quite yourself anymore

cards.mainText: On your left you see a church of the Fortuna Order

decisionLeft.pickedText: You joined the Fortuna Order. You somehow feel luckier than before

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignored your chance to join the Fortuna Order and discarded their pamphlet.

cards.mainText: You see a child selling some picked flowers

decisionLeft.choiceText: Buy some flowers from the child
decisionLeft.pickedText: You bought some flowers from the child. He seems genuinely happy

decisionRight.pickedText: The child looked disappointed but went right to the next potential customer

decision.pickedText: You gave him some money. After his initial confusion that you do not want a flower in return he gave you a big smile

cards.mainText: A smiling man approaches you. "Ah, a fellow follower of the Fortuna Order! You look like you need some help. What can I do for you?"

decisionLeft.pickedText: "Of course, of course! I have some stew left, think nothing of it! I will always help a member of the Fortuna Order" You ate some stew the friendly stranger gave you

decisionRight.choiceText: Ask for a place to rest
decisionRight.pickedText: "Of course, of course! You must be tired. You can rest with me, think nothing of it! I will always help a member of the Fortuna Order". You slept well

cards.mainText: You find a piece of jewelery on the ground. Shortly after a woman approaches you, claiming that she has lost her earring somewhere and asks you to help her find it

decisionLeft.pickedText: You gave her the jewelery you found. As a thanks she gave you some coins

decisionRight.pickedText: You kept the earring and sold it at then nearest jewelery

cards.mainText: You see a man trying to sell medicine. "Buy it! Buy it! The new Inutilis medicine against every pain you have!"

decisionLeft.pickedText: You bought and took some Inutilis, you feel like nothing has changed

decisionRight.pickedText: You didn't buy any Inutilis

cards.mainText: You see a man trying to sell medicine. "Buy it! Buy it! The new Inutilis medicine against every pain you have!"

decisionLeft.pickedText: "Refund? Why should I? There is nothing better than Inutilis! I can make you a deal though, 2 for the price of one, what do you say?". You punch him in the face and walk away

decisionRight.pickedText: You didn't buy any Inutilis

cards.mainText: There is a camp in the distance

decisionLeft.pickedText: At the camp you see a men sitting at a campfire all by himself. He invites you over to eat. You both take turns sleeping

decisionRight.pickedText: You walk past the camp

cards.mainText: While walking through the forest you feel watched. Suddenly a Tiger cub jumps out of a bush and attacks you

decisionLeft.pickedText: You screamed at the top of your lungs and put yourself in a defending position. It pounced on you, damaging your arms. You use the chance to kick the tiger cub in the stomach and run away

decisionRight.pickedText: You ran with all of your might, looking for a place to hide. You hid and waited for some time

cards.mainText: You see a bunny, not noticing your presence

decisionLeft.pickedText: You hunted the bunny

decisionRight.pickedText: You spared the bunny

cards.mainText: A flock of birds sit on trees and chirp in harmony

decisionLeft.pickedText: You listened to their birdsong, you cannot seem to get it out of your head

decisionRight.pickedText: You picked up a rock, aimed at a bird and threw it. You missed

cards.mainText: You hear a river near you

decisionLeft.pickedText: You walked towards the river

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignored the river

cards.mainText: You arrived at the river you heard. It seems to be flowing fast

decisionLeft.pickedText: You drank out of the river, clenching your thirst

decisionRight.pickedText: You tried to cross the river but the current was too fast. After a lot of struggling you made it out

cards.mainText: You see a stone ruin on your way

decisionLeft.pickedText: You walked towards the ruin

decisionRight.pickedText: You walked ahead without going near the ruin

cards.mainText: You see the ruin right in front of you. It seems to be some sort of crypt. A big stone door with a sigill portraying what looks like a shield with wings and a socket for something right in the middle blocks your way,

decisionLeft.pickedText: You looked at the carvings on the walls, showing a stone radiating light with people worshiping it. Sadly you did not find another entry or way to open the door

decisionRight.pickedText: You tried to break in using your hands but were unable to make a dent in the door

decision.choiceText: Put your red crystal in the socket
decision.pickedText: You put the red crystal in the socket, making the door open. You picked the crystal up again and went inside the ruin

cards.mainText: Inside of there ruin is big room with a stone pedestal right in the middle. The whole room is decorated in elaborate patterns. Your red crystal seems to be reacting to it

decisionLeft.choiceText: Place your red crystal on the pedestal
decisionLeft.pickedText: As soon as you placed the crystal red rays of light spew out of it, illuminating the whole room. Suddenly you felt the ground shaking and walls crumbling. You picked up the red crystal and dashed outside while the ruin collapsed

decisionRight.pickedText: You searched the room for treasure. Luckily you find a chest you can open. As soon as you opened the chest and grabbed a pile of coins the ground starts to tremble. You ran outside while the ruin collapsed, making its secrets lost forever

cards.mainText: Walking through the forest you notice a bunch of pale blue mushrooms growing at the side of a nearby tree. They seem edible

decisionLeft.pickedText: The moment you swallowed the first mushroom you immediately felt sick and vomited it back up

decisionRight.pickedText: You do not think eating some random mushrooms in the forest is a good idea, so you left them there

cards.mainText: Walking through the forest you notice a bunch of bright red mushrooms growing at the side of a nearby tree. They seem edible

decisionLeft.pickedText: The mushrooms were a bit dry but otherwise tasted quite decent. You feel refreshed and continue through the forest

decisionRight.pickedText: You did not think eating some random mushrooms in the forest is a good idea, so you left them there

cards.mainText: As you wander through the thicket of the deeper parts of the forest you notice the decaying corpse of a brigant. An arrow pokes out of the chest and must have been the reason for their untimely demise

decisionLeft.pickedText: Pillaging through the clothes of the deceased brigant you found a small coin pouch still filled with some money

decisionRight.pickedText: You did not want to disturb the dead and left him be

decision.pickedText: You gave a prayer to Fortuna wishing this unlucky being better luck in their next life

cards.mainText: You stumble upon an adorable bear cub. It waddles towards you on its stumpy little legs

decisionLeft.choiceText: Try to pet the bear cub
decisionLeft.pickedText: As you reached down with your hand to pet this most precious little forest critter you failed to notice the very angry bear mother charging at you. You barely escaped with your life and a decent amount of scars

decisionRight.pickedText: Realizing the danger of the situation you carefully backed away from the cup. This proves to be the right decision as you saw the cups mother quickly approaching you. You turned around quickly and made it out unscathed

decision.pickedText: As you got closer to the "juicy" little bear cup, its very angry mother came charging at you from a nearby bush. But before she can reached you felt an intense headache and fell unconscious. As you came back to your senses, you only saw the huge bear running away in fear. You wonder what scared her away

cards.mainText: You hear a caravan approaching, heading towards a city. A sign on their caravan says they take passengers for a measly 10 coins

decisionLeft.pickedText: You gave the leader of the caravan 10 coins and sit down in the back of wagon. After a days journey you reach the city

decisionRight.pickedText: You let the caravan pass

cards.mainText: As you walk through the market a masked person bumps into you. You fall to the ground and see them making a run for it. As you get up you notice that one of your coin bags is missing

decisionLeft.pickedText: You were able to catch up to the thief after an rather exhaustive pursuit. The thief, not expecting to be caught, quickly threw your coin purse away and made a run for it in the other direction. You are were to get your money back and feel satisfied with yourself

decisionRight.choiceText: Give up on your coin bag
decisionRight.pickedText: Thinking it is not worth the hassle to run after the thief so you continued through the city without the coin bag and its content

decision.pickedText: As you started running after the thief you see a man catching him. The man gave you your money back and you thanked him

cards.mainText: As you walk through the forest a lone hunter catches your eye, looking rather concentrated

decisionLeft.pickedText: You approached the hunter, who noticed you a long time before. His prey on the other hand did not and ran away as soon as it heard you

decisionRight.pickedText: You did not want to bother the hunter so you let him be

cards.mainText: "I almost had him, what do you want?". The hunter is annoyed with you

decisionLeft.pickedText: "I know my way around here. The nearest city is not that far off, I can show you if you want"...

decisionRight.pickedText: You apologized to the hunter for his lost prey and excused yourself

cards.mainText: The hunter offered you to guide you for the nearest city but only if you compensate him

decisionLeft.pickedText: You payed the hunter what he asked for and so he guided you through the forest to the nearest city

decisionRight.pickedText: You declined his offer of an reliable way to the nearest city

cards.mainText: As you walk you notice smoke rising in the distance. In need for some company you wander towards it. Arriving there you notice a few traveller making camp

decisionLeft.choiceText: Ask if you can rest with them
decisionLeft.pickedText: You set yourself at the campfire with them and shared stories. You went to sleep when it was your turn. After getting some rest you woke up, noticing they prepare to set out. You thanked them and went your way

decisionRight.choiceText: Ask if you can do some work for them
decisionRight.pickedText: You asked for work in exchange for money. You refilled their water bottles at the nearest river an got some for yourself as well. They thanked you and gave you some compensation

cards.mainText: Walking along the deserts main road you meet a wandering trader who is currently taking a break from the sweltering heat. "Greetings, fellow traveler! can I interest you in some cactus juice. Just 5 coins its a local speciality!"

decisionLeft.pickedText: Drinking the cactus juice you felt refreshed and ready to continue through the desert

decisionRight.pickedText: Not trusting the trader in the middle of the desert you moved on with out buying anything

cards.mainText: As you continue your journey through the desert you see a sandstorm quickly approaching on the horizon

decisionLeft.choiceText: Take cover at the nearest hill
decisionLeft.pickedText: Not waiting around you dropped face down into the sand. The sandstorm passes relatively quickly and your come out of it with barely a scratch

decisionRight.pickedText: While you futilely searched for cover, you were surprised by the faster-approaching-than-thought sandstorm. You twirled around in the storm, not getting a hold of anything but sand in your eyes. After a while the storm passed, leaving you exhausted on the floor

cards.mainText: Walking through the blistering heat you notice an oasis in the blurry horizon

decisionLeft.pickedText: You ran towards the oasis jumping into its cool waters. As you felt towards - what you believed to be refreshing water - you realized it was just a mirage, mixed with a wishful figment of your imagination. You dropped head first into a pile, not trusting yourself anymore

decisionRight.pickedText: Not falling for the illusions of the desert you continued trotting through the heat

cards.mainText: Walking through the blistering heat you notice an oasis in the horizon

decisionLeft.pickedText: You ran towards the oasis jumping into its cool waters. You felt refreshed and more than ready to continue.

decisionRight.pickedText: Not falling for the illusions of the desert you continued trotting through the heat

cards.mainText: In front of you is an empty desert, nothing to see and nothing to do except moving on

decisionLeft.pickedText: You moved on walking through the desert

decisionRight.pickedText: You moved on walking through the desert

cards.mainText: As you walk through the endless sandy hills you notice a small tilted wooden cross, signaling a burial, in the ground

decisionLeft.pickedText: You tried to pay your respect but did not know what to do, so you just straightened the cross

decisionRight.pickedText: People dying on their journeys is quite common, so you just moved on and hoped that you will not be one of them

decision.choiceText: Lay your flowers to the cross
decision.pickedText: You made some space in the sand and placed your flowers to the cross. While doing so however you noticed a small box buried as well. Inside of it is some money and a yellow crystal

cards.mainText: You see some herbs in a clearing

decisionLeft.pickedText: The herbs heal your wounds

decisionRight.pickedText: You ignored the herbs

cards.mainText: There are two paths ahead of you

decisionLeft.pickedText: You decide to take the left path, which takes you into a desert

decisionRight.pickedText: You choose the right path, which takes you into a desert

cards.mainText: As you walk through the desert you see a cactus with fruit on it

decisionLeft.pickedText: You decided to eat some of the fruits

decisionRight.pickedText: Since you do not know if the fruits are edible, you keep on walking

cards.mainText: In the distance you see a Forest

decisionLeft.pickedText: You walked towards it, eventually arriving in a shady Forest

decisionRight.pickedText: As you decided to ignore the Forest, you continue your walk through the Desert
